ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry I havn t posted all day, but I ve been working on the site again. With Megan s help (actually, she did all the work), the site now has fanart and fanfic

Sorry I havn't posted all day, but I've been working on the site 
again. With Megan's help (actually, she did all the work), the site 
now has fanart and fanfic storage sections!

Everyone is encouraged to submit art and fics (heck, look at 
my "Masterpiece" in the fanart. Can't get any worse than that! :-).

Go to the site ( http://nbwrpg.com ) to learn more!

Also, I've added the links section! Now the only thing under 
development is the message board.
